Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

refugees 2024.12.0

  • Updated with the release of Global Trends 2024.

refugees 2024.6.0

CRAN release: 2024-10-19

  • Updated with the release of Mid-Year Trends 2024.

refugees 2023.12.0

CRAN release: 2024-06-17

  • Updated with the release of Global Trends 2023.
  • Corrected field label in the flows dataset (returned_refugees -> refugee_like)

refugees 2023.6.0

CRAN release: 2023-10-26

  • Updated with the release of Mid-Year Trends 2023.

refugees 2022.12.1

CRAN release: 2023-08-16

  • Updates to the demographics table. Now includes previously missing 2021 data and corrections to the 2013, 2014, and 2022 data from the initial release.

refugees 2022.12.0

CRAN release: 2023-07-08

  • Initial release. Data from UNHCR’s Global Trends 2022 report.
